text.text: A placa Sega Model 2 foi um marco importante para a indústria de arcade e ajudou a lançar várias franquias de arcade importantes dos anos 90, incluindo Daytona USA, Virtua Cop, Sega Rally Championship, Dead or Alive, Virtua Striker e Cyber ​​Troopers Virtual-On.

text.name: info1
text.text: Sega Model 2 board was an important milestone for the arcade industry, and helped launch several key arcade franchises of the 1990s, including Daytona USA, Virtua Cop, Sega Rally Championship, Dead or Alive, Virtua Striker and The House of the Dead.
